resources.string: Oops! Something didn\'\ t happened as planned.
Unable to access Content View, check if the content view was initialized.
Unable to access Container View. You should pass the view that will be replaced by PlaceHolderJ views.
Unable to access Empty View, Error View or Loading View. You should pass at least one placeholder view to init PlaceHolderJ.
Unable to access Loading View, check if the loading view was initialized
Unable to access Empty View, check if the empty view was initialized.
Unable to access Error View, check if the error view was initialized.
